Detailed Description

High level manager used to obtain an instance of an NfcAdapter.

you can call the static helper NfcAdapter#getDefaultAdapter(gaia::core::Context) to obtain. the NfcAdapter.

Developer Guides

For more information about using NFC, read the Near Field Communication developer guide.
See also:
NfcAdapter::getDefaultAdapter(gaia::core::Context)
